entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
